name: Plasma SDK Apps Complete Overhaul
description: Complete overhaul of 5 Plasma SDK apps: backend fixes, UI redesign (Claymorphism/Liquid Glass), asset generation (Nano Banana), animations, and flow redesigns

tasks.title: Fix Splitzy bill creation flow - remove sign message, add payment links
tasks.description: The current Splitzy flow shows a confusing 'Sign message' modal when creating bills. This needs to be removed. Instead, when a bill is created, generate unique payment links for each participant that they can use to pay their share directly.
acceptance_criteria: Remove EIP-712 signing from bill creation
Generate unique payment link per participant when bill is finalized
Payment links should include: amount, recipient wallet, bill reference
Add 'Copy Link' and 'Share' buttons for each participant
Native share sheet integration (WhatsApp, SMS, etc.)

tasks.title: Fix StreamPay create stream - use mock implementation without signatures
tasks.description: StreamPay shows 'Invalid signature' error when creating streams. The mock implementation exists but something triggers signature verification. Fix to use pure database mock without any gasless signature requirements.
acceptance_criteria: Create stream works without signature errors
Streams are stored in SQLite database
Withdraw and cancel work with mock implementation
Stream progress updates correctly over time

tasks.title: Add Pledictions mock prediction market backend
tasks.description: Pledictions needs a working backend to display markets and allow betting. Create mock API routes that return sample prediction markets and handle bet placement.
acceptance_criteria: GET /api/markets returns list of prediction markets
GET /api/markets/[id] returns market details with current odds
POST /api/bets places a bet and updates mock balance
Seed data includes 10+ sample markets across categories

tasks.title: Plenmo Claymorphism redesign
tasks.description: Redesign Plenmo (plasma-venmo) with Claymorphism design system. Focus on soft, tactile UI elements that feel premium and playful. Mobile-first with proper viewport handling.
acceptance_criteria: All cards use clay-card styling with proper shadows
Amount input uses Cash App style (large font, numpad)

tasks.title: Pledictions Liquid Glass redesign
tasks.description: Redesign Pledictions (plasma-predictions) with iOS 26 Liquid Glass aesthetic. Premium prediction market feel with proper odds display and category navigation.
acceptance_criteria: Apply liquid-glass class to all cards and panels
Prediction cards show odds with proper formatting
Category tabs with horizontal scroll and indicators
Betting modal with clear amount input

tasks.title: Splitzy Claymorphism + flow redesign
tasks.description: Redesign Splitzy (bill-split) with Claymorphism and implement the new bill creation flow with payment link generation instead of confusing sign messages.
acceptance_criteria: Review step with clear per-person breakdown

tasks.title: StreamPay Payroll-style Liquid Glass
tasks.description: Redesign StreamPay (plasma-stream) as a professional payroll streaming app with Liquid Glass. Research Gusto/Rippling for patterns. Timeline visualization for streams.
acceptance_criteria: Progress ring component for active streams

tasks.title: SubKiller Liquid Glass + setup state
tasks.description: Redesign SubKiller with Liquid Glass and proper handling of the setup state when Google OAuth is not configured. Add scanning animation and subscription cards.
acceptance_criteria: Setup message styled nicely when OAuth not configured

tasks.title: Create Nano Banana image generation utility
tasks.description: Implement a shared utility for generating images using Google's Nano Banana API (Gemini 2.5 Flash Image). Include retry logic, rate limiting handling, and multiple output formats.
acceptance_criteria: generateImage() function with prompt, aspectRatio, model options
editImage() function for modifying existing images
Rate limit tracking to avoid 429 errors
Support for saving to file or returning base64

tasks.title: Generate app logos and brand illustrations
tasks.description: Use Nano Banana to generate unique logos and illustrations for all 5 apps. Store in public/images/ directories. Ensure transparent/removable backgrounds.
acceptance_criteria: Empty state illustration for each app (400x400)
All assets saved to respective public/images/ folders

tasks.title: Create deterministic avatar generation system
tasks.description: Build a system to generate unique avatars for users based on their wallet address. Use Nano Banana with deterministic prompts so the same address always gets the same avatar.
acceptance_criteria: Gradient color selection based on address hash
Fallback to gradient initials if generation fails

tasks.title: Add CSS animation library to UI package
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive CSS animation library with reusable keyframes and utility classes for all apps. Include float, pulse, stream-flow, coin-drop animations.
acceptance_criteria: Float animation for cards and icons
CSS custom properties for brand colors

tasks.title: Add Lottie animations for common states
tasks.description: Integrate Lottie for complex animations that can't be done with CSS. Use free animations from LottieFiles for success, loading, and empty states.

tasks.title: End-to-end flow testing for all apps
tasks.description: Create comprehensive E2E tests to verify all major flows work correctly. Use Playwright. Test on mobile viewport sizes.
acceptance_criteria: Plenmo: Login -> Send money -> Verify in history
Pledictions: Login -> Place bet -> Check balance
Splitzy: Create bill -> Add participants -> Generate links
StreamPay: Create stream -> View dashboard -> Withdraw
SubKiller: See setup message OR scan emails
All tests pass on 375px viewport (iPhone SE)

environment_requirements.GEMINI_API_KEY: Required for Nano Banana image generation. Get from https://aistudio.google.com/apikey
environment_requirements.GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID: Required for SubKiller Gmail scanning. Get from https://console.cloud.google.com/
environment_requirements.PLASMA_RELAYER_SECRET: Optional - needed for production gasless transactions
